faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Collection Intelligence
faq.a1: Collection Intelligence is an AI-powered platform that automates your accounts receivable collections with 7 specialized AI agents, each designed to handle different collection scenarios.
faq.q2: How does it integrate with my existing systems?
faq.a2: We offer native integrations with Stripe, QuickBooks, and other popular billing systems. Your data syncs automatically in real-time.
faq.a3: Yes, we use enterprise-grade encryption and are SOC 2 compliant. Your data is never shared and is stored securely.
faq.q4: Can I customize the AI messages?
faq.a4: Absolutely. You can customize tone, timing, and content of all AI-generated messages to match your brand voice.
faq.q5: What happens if a customer responds?
faq.a5: Our AI agents can understand and respond to customer replies, or escalate to your team when human intervention is needed.
faq.a6: Most customers are up and running in under 30 minutes. Connect your billing system and let the AI take over.
